show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's Great Adventure in the South Seas
other_title: Doraemon e os Piratas dos Mares do Sul (Portuguese)
Doraemon y los piratas de los mares del sur (Spanish)
Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Nankai Daibōken (Japanese)
哆啦A梦 大雄的南海大冒险 (Chinese (PRC))
映画ドラえもん のび太の南海大冒険 (Japanese)

plot: After agreeing on doing a project about the seas with his friends, Nobita starts reading the Treasure Island novel and convinces Doraemon on going on a journey in search for a real treasure hidden on a Caribbean island.
